name: Elementalz
description:
Elementalz is a puzzle platform game, where you use 4 elements to complete the levels.

       

Features

puzzle-platform.

70 challenging levels.

infinite lives (no rage quit :) ).

Future updates with new levels.

Expert mode ( same 70 levels with 7 lives).

Sountrack used in this game

https://lunalucid.itch.io/free-creative-commons-bgm-collection
